The relationship between Paan Singh Tomar and Circle Inspector Chauhan can be classified as conflicting. While Paan Singh Tomar was in dire need of water, Circle Inspector Chauhan refused to provide it to him by stating 'Tribhuwan, dacoits have no caste.' This incident shows a clear difference in attitude towards the two individuals based on their social status.
